comments: T.K. Miller is an error in Ann. Mag. Nat. Hist., ser. 2, 2: 261 (1848), probably a 'J' misread from a manuscript
examples: Hygrophorus russocoriaceus Berk. & Jos.K.Mill. in Ann. Mag. Nat. Hist., ser. 2, 2: 261 (1848)
source: IMI. Desmond, Dict. Brit. & Irish Botanists & Horticulturists (1994)
